title: Sheikh Hasina unveils AL election manifesto, pledging to build smart Bangladesh
excerpt: Awami League (AL) President Sheikh Hasina today announced her party’s polls manifesto for 2024 general election, vowing to build a developed, prosperous and Smart Bangladesh by 2041....
